products.title: K20-KT1200  2.1L Complete Engine - SFWD Turbo Race Engine
products.body_html:
The 4 Piston Racing K20-KT1200 Crate Engine is specifically designed for SFWD and Outlaw Class turbocharged race cars looking to exceed 1200hp.  This engine is meticulously assembled with the best components to ensure that you can go round after round pushing 60+psi boost.  There are other engines on the market that get some cars down the track, but the devil is in the details of this engine.  We want you to have the same power on your 75th pass as you did on your 1st.  A purpose-built cylinder head with a valve job that is designed to withstand abuse, matched up with a tool steel billet turbo cam that carries power into 11k rpm.  You will notice this engine is more responsive on gear changes allowing you to stay in the meat of the powerband.  Considerations are made for your team when they do have to perform maintenance between rounds with all of our engine block surfaces being deburred and smoothed for no cut hands.  Take your SFWD race program to the next level with an engine that was specifically designed to put you at the top. Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote.  We ship worldwide.

  • 4P rigid ductile iron sleeve with o-ring
  • 4P GRP Solid Beam turbo rod with bolt upgrade
  • Diamond Outlaw flat top piston with tool steel wrist pin
  • ACL race bearings, ARP 625+ fasteners, exclusive 4P spec head gasket for better seal
  • 4P Pro TSX CNC Cylinder Head with Ferrea super alloy plus valves, valve springs, retainers, and locks (Pro 156v2 if needing to use K20 water neck arrangement)
  • 4P tool steel billet Outlaw Turbo VTEC Killer camshafts, 4P Aluminum Rocker Arms, and adjustable cam gears
  • 4P Ported oil pump and Moroso baffled sump with Oil Return
  • All new Honda timing components and hardware
  • Complete engine valve cover to oil pan
  • Meticulously assembled and supplied with detailed build sheets

Recommended Use

  • Max effort race engine
  • VP C85 or Methanol recommended
  • K20 or K24 available

Features and Benefits

  • Specific Components designed for SFWD durability
  • Proprietary sleeve design is thicker and harder for better ring seal and longevity
  • Premium Valvetrain Components for Extended Durability
  • Precision Machined CNC Cylinder Head Designed for use throughout the powerband
  • Meticulously Assembled - Supplied with full engine specifications and tolerances
  • Recommend periodic maintenance procedures

When you purchase a 4 Piston Racing complete engine, you aren't just buying any run-of-the-mill engine package. You are investing in a fully developed and tested engine program that is designed not only for maximum power output, but also for maximum durability. Our engines are meticulously assembled with a great deal of pride in a clean environment, using the only the finest calibrated tools and by engine builders who specialize in performance racing applications.

Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping estimate

products.title: Arias 14.7:1 Strutted XR Series K24 All Motor Pistons
products.body_html:
Arias has introduced this strutted lightweight forging as an upgrade over their standard shelf piston.

-11.4 CC Dome for maximum compression
-Lateral Gas Ports
-Tool steel wrist pins
-4P Exclusive ring package

308-320 grams depending on bore size.

88mm Bore is 14.7:1
90mm Bore is 15:1
**You can adjust your chamber size for MUCH more compression if you desire.  We can do this on your head while it is here**

products.title: 4P Purple K-Series Ferrea Roller Rocker Arms
products.body_html:
Ferrea Roller Rocker arms not only reduce friction and valvetrain weight, they allow you to run a more aggressive camshafts. These rockers are 50% less mass than a an OEM steel Honda rocker arm. These rockers eliminate VTEC and allow you to run an aggressive "VTEC Killer" camshaft, and you also can run a 3 lobe traditional camshaft, but it will only use the center VTEC cam lobe. The weight savings will show up in increased horsepower at high rpm and the engine will hold and carry that power longer past peak.

The purple RR8000 4 Piston rockers is exclusively available through 4 Piston Racing. It features struts for improved rigidity and high quality lash adjusters that last longer than other brands. This rocker is essential if you are wanting to run camshafts over .600" lift.

products.title: 4 Piston Tool Pack - All 4
products.body_html:
4 Piston Tool Pack

1 - Deck Bridge

1 - Valve Spring Micrometer

1 - Valve Seal Installation Tool

1 - Ring Squaring Tool

MADE IN THE USA 

 

The econo gauges that we sell work perfectly fine for taking a piston to deck measurement.  Don't feel that you need to spend $200 on the Fowler...the Econo works great.

products.title: 4 Piston Cam Seal (B and H Series)
products.body_html:
The 4 Piston Cam Seal is one of those finishing touches that sets your project apart from the masses. This piece is CNC machined from high-quality 6061 billet aluminum and then hard anodized for a durable finish. The 4P logo is then CNC machined into the seal. The seal comes with 3 o-rings pre-installed for a great seal and precise fit.

Like all 4P manufactured products, these are 100% MADE IN THE USA

Fits Honda B-Series, H-Series, and DOHC D-Series

products.title: 4 Piston Deck Bridge Tool
products.body_html:
The 4P Deck Bridge Tool allows you to check your piston to deck height so that you can accurately record this information. This helps you choose the proper head gasket thickness and set your desired piston to head clearance. Unlike other universal bridges on the market, our deck bridge is sized specifically for smaller bore diameter engines. Ideal for 75mm to 95mm bore. This is made to be used with 2 gauges for a true accurate measurement.

Available bare or with two gauge configurations. The econo gauge is sufficient for this measurement and works well.

MADE IN THE USA

products.title: 4 Piston Valve Seal Installation Tool
products.body_html:
The 4P valve seal installation tool allows simple and precise installation of your valve seals without tearing or damaging the seal. You press them into place by hand and then lightly tap with a rubberized hammer.

Available in BLACK and PURPLE

**This tool is for use with 5.5mm valve stems.  This covers D, B, H, F, and K-Series engines, but not B18A/B non-VTEC**

MADE IN THE USA

products.title: 4 Piston Valve Spring Height Micrometer
products.body_html:
The 4P valve spring micrometer is used between the seat base in the head and the retainer to get a quick and accurate measurement of your valve spring installed height. This tool is sized so that it can be used in a variety of applications including the tight constraints of Honda B, H, and K series engines, as well as most overhead cam engines. These high quality tools have a fine thread pitch for great accuracy and are easy to use with convenient gripping surfaces.

Measures 1.300" to 1.700"

Outside diameter or base of micrometer 1.160

Retainer side inside diameter .920

Universal application
PURPLE ONLY.  Black is discontinued due to everyone buying purple.

MADE IN THE USA

products.title: 4P Ported H22 Oil Pump
products.body_html: The stock oil pump is one of the weak links in your H22 engine.  These pumps cavitate and lose pressure at high rpm and especially when oil temperatures rise in endurance applications.  Our ported pump increases flow and eliminates cavitation to resolve these shortcomings. We start with a brand new OEM oil pump from Honda, disassemble, port and smooth oil passages to increase flow. The pumps are then cleaned, oiled, reassembled and repackaged. This part is cheap insurance to protect your multi-thousand dollar investment.

products.title: 4P Outlaw EVO X CNC Head
products.body_html:
The highly anticipated 4P Outlaw EVO X CNC cylinder head is here!  This is THE best cylinder head on the market for your EVO X with regards to performance and machining quality. We have put countless hours of development and tested against all others on the market to bring you the best performing cylinder head whether you are endurance racing or drag racing.  We build these heads to compliment your engine, whether that be a 2.3L small turbo broad powerband car, or a 2.0L high rpm drag race car.

4P EVO X heads power THE fastest cars in the world.

Includes

  • CNC Ported intake and exhaust ports
  • OEM valve guides or optional bronze valve guides
  • Precision CNC valve job using the latest NEWEN Fixed Turning technology
  • Resurface

Recommended Use

  • Road Race, Time Attack, Auto X
  • Drag Race
  • Street use and daily driving
  • Gasoline, E85, Ethanol, Methanol

Features & Benefits

  • 350+ CFM airflow, more than 60 CFM improvement
  • 20+ CFM over the competition lifting the valve with popular camshaft grinds and 30+cfm over the competition for race cam applications.
  • Slow-cut precision 5-axis cnc porting, second to none on machining quality.
  • Full length bronze manganese guide for valve stability
  • High velocity intake port design
  • Unique power producing exhaust port design that outflows other heads...even those with larger valves!  Boost response on gear changes that will SET YOU BACK!!
  • Our heads are all shipped with installation tips, a sheet of desired clearances for setting up your engine, and a flow chart from your head.
  • Optional Super Alloy valves are a hybrid incoloy that are 5 times the tensile strength of an Inconel valve, less weight, and have better heat management properties. These valves have memory to return to their original shape as they cool.
  • Optional PAC Enhanced valve springs are made in the USA and have gone through anti-fatigue processes for longer life and better valve control than the competition.

All heads require a core! Right now we are unable to effectively source good used cores, and we cannot get new cores from Mitsubishi.  You have to send your head in for porting.  Sorry for the inconvenience.

*If you are sending your head in for porting, please send your buckets and camshafts so that we can set lash*

products.title: 4P Outlaw 370 H22 CNC Head
products.body_html:
The Outlaw 370 H22 is the newest addition to the 4P H-Series lineup.  We have taken design attributes from our world record setting K-Series program and applied those to the H22 head in order to create the meanest H head on the market for maximum All Motor horsepower.  This head features a +2mm intake valve that moves over 370cfm.  Beyond the flowbench, it features a custom intake and exhaust valve design  and uses the same throat and airspeed formula that has set multiple records over multiple racing series.

  • CNC Ported intake and exhaust ports
  • Oversized intake seats for a +2mm intake valve
  • OEM valve guides or optional bronze valve guides.
  • Precision CNC valve job using the latest NEWEN Fixed Turning technology
  • Resurface
  • This head requires custom intake valves.  You can source them yourself or we can provide them.

Recommended Use

  • All Motor Race
  • Suitable for 2.0-2.4L Road Race engines with a high rpm powerband in mind
  • Suitable for 2.3-2.7L Drag Race engines looking to produce maximum power.

Features & Benefits

  • Slow-cut precision 5-axis cnc porting, second to none on machining quality.
  • Others talk about big flow, but we have tested ALL others on the market.  They fall WELL short of our 370cfm flow on our flow bench in equal conditions, regardless of what they advertise.
  • 50 degree valve job for increased on-track performance
  • Unique power producing exhaust port design with up to 25cfm over our competition.
  • Intake port features a laid out short turn for superior air speed around the valve when compared to conventional tall short turn port designs.
  • Full length bronze manganese valve guide for valve stability.
  • Our heads are all shipped with installation tips, a sheet of desired clearances for setting up your engine, and a flow chart from your head.

All heads require a core! You can send us your head, or purchase one from us at the current market price.

products.title: MOAB GSR CNC Head
products.body_html:
The new MOAB GSR is the ultimate B-Series racing CNC cylinder head.  It moves 320 cfm through a 34mm intake valve and flow is improved through the entire lift range from top to bottom.  This head is ideal for large all motor engines looking to make maximum power and for high horsepower turbo cars wanting to push beyond what our world record holding Outlaw ports have achieved.  

4P CNC heads make significantly more power, AND last up to 3 times longer than the competition. That is what our cylinder head program is all about...pumping out the biggest horsepower, keeping it responsive, and doing so with increased longevity. With a high power turbo car, your biggest battle is dealing with extreme exhaust temperatures. Our heads have design features that pull heat away from the valve and improve reliability on the street and race track.

4P Cylinder Heads hold more world records than all others combined.

Includes

  • CNC Ported intake and exhaust ports
  • Oversized intake seats for a +1mm intake valve
  • OEM or Bronze guides available
  • Precision CNC valve job using the latest NEWEN Fixed Turning technology
  • Resurface

Recommended Use

  • Outlaw Turbo, True Street, SFWD
  • Street and Race All Motor
  • Road Race
  • E85, Methanol, Gasoline

Features & Benefits

  • 320 CFM and Huge flow through the entire lift range.
  • Slow-cut precision 5-axis cnc porting, second to none on machining quality.
  • Full length bronze manganese guide for valve stability (optional)
  • High velocity intake port design
  • Unique power producing exhaust port design.
  • Our heads are all shipped with installation tips, a sheet of desired clearances for setting up your engine, and a flow chart from your head.

All heads require a core! You can send us your head, or purchase one from us at the current market price.

products.title: 4P CNC Porting for Skunk2 Ultra Manifold
products.body_html:
If you have already purchased a Skunk2 Ultra Race or Ultra Street manifold, you can send it to the address below to be CNC Ported.

4 Piston Racing CNC Ported runners flow 50-70 CFM more air than an off the shelf manifold depending on the port profile.  These ports are designed to be port matched to our race winning CNC ported cylinder heads.

Please included your contact info and what engine you have in the box with the runners.  Ship the manifold runners to:

4 Piston Racing
200 Colin Ct.
Danville, IN  46122

317-440-6777

products.title: K24-K480 2.7L Complete Engine - DRAG RACE
products.body_html:
Description

The 4 Piston Racing K480 Drag Race Engine is specifically designed to put you at the top of the class in any racing series. This engine is a "no-compromises" approach using the highest quality components available, starting with a rigid RR ductile iron sleeve and our durable 340 gram aluminum rod. This is connected to a strutted ultra lightweight 16:1 compression 260 gram piston with tool steel wrist pin. The piston and ring package are specifically designed for this engine to provide superior ring seal for maximum compression. Air and fuel move through this engine via our 425+ CFM CNC Cylinder Head and Skunk2 BMFx billet camshaft. We are on the cutting edge of 4 valve cylinder head technology and you will not find similar performance in any other cylinder head. Our unique design allows these engines to peak and carry beyond 10,000 rpm, all while retaining the bottom end for excellent acceleration through the early part of the track. The super alloy valves are controlled by the infamous 4P PSI Pro Stock valve spring. This spring produces high rpm power that is lost in other valve springs, and helps to protect your engine in the event of a missed gear. On a Dynojet through a FWD transmission, this engine will produce 420-460whp depending on the fuel used. When you buy a 4P Drag Race engine you aren't just investing in a top competitor, you are investing in a customer support system and an engine program that you can depend on for multiple race seasons. Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote. We ship worldwide.

  • 4P rigid ductile iron sleeve Honda K24 engine block 106mm stroke x 90mm bore
  • 4P GRP aluminum 340 gram pro stock connecting rod
  • Wiseco strutted box forged ultra lightweight piston, 90mm, 16:1 compression
  • ACL race bearings, ARP fasteners, exclusive 4P spec head gasket for better seal
  • 4P Reaper CNC race head, 4P custom valves, 4P PSI Pro Stock valve springs, Ferrea locks
  • Skunk2 BMFx Camshaft
  • 4P Ported oil pump and baffled sump
  • All new Honda timing components and hardware
  • Complete engine valve cover to oil pan
  • Meticulously assembled and supplied with detailed build sheets

Recommended Use

  • Drag Race
  • Dedicated Grudge Race / Street Race
  • Race fuel required

Features and Benefits

  • 106mm Billet Crankshaft x 90mm Bore
  • Lightweight components that are designed to last
  • 4P CNC Cylinder Head with the latest in 4 valve cylinder head technology
  • Premium 4P PSI Pro Stock Valve Springs produce high rpm power and protect your engine in the event of a missed gear
  • 4P Oil Pump provides superior oiling at high rpm
  • 4P Engraved Valve Cover
  • Cleanliness and attention to detail that everyone will be proud to own
  • Meticulously Assembled - Supplied with full engine specifications and tolerances
  • Recommend periodic maintenance procedures

When you purchase a 4 Piston Racing complete engine, you aren't just buying any run-of-the-mill engine package. You are investing in a fully developed and tested engine program that is designed not only for maximum power output, but also for maximum durability. Our engines are meticulously assembled with a great deal of pride in a clean environment, using the only the finest calibrated tools and by engine builders who specialize in performance racing applications. 

Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote

products.title: K24-K400 2.5L Complete Engine - ROAD RACE / RALLY
products.body_html:
The 4 Piston Racing K400 Endurance Engine is specifically designed for maximum power output and extended durability. This engine is a "no-compromises" approach using the highest quality components available, starting with a rigid 4P ductile iron sleeve and our durable I-beam billet steel connecting rod. This long ratio rod is connected to a strutted ultra lightweight, short-skirt piston with tool steel wrist pin. The piston and ring package are specifically designed for this engine to provide superior ring seal and extended use in abusive conditions. Air and fuel move through this engine via our infamous 400 CFM "Pro 163" CNC Cylinder Head and 4P RR4 billet camshaft. We are on the cutting edge of 4 valve cylinder head technology and you will not find similar performance in any other cylinder head. Valve motion is controlled by the highest quality PAC valve spring. Oil pressure and controlled by a 4P CNC Ported oil pump and baffled pan, designed to keep your engine properly lubricated in the most extreme g forces in all directions. When you buy a 4P Endurance Engine you aren't just investing in a top competitor, you are investing in a customer support system and an engine program that you can depend on for multiple race seasons. Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote.  We ship worldwide.

  • 4P rigid ductile iron sleeve Honda K20 or K24 engine block 99mm stroke x 89.5mm bore
  • 4P I-beam long rod connecting to an 18mm tool steel wrist pin
  • 4P Wiseco strutted box forged ultra lightweight piston, armor plated, 89.5mm high compression
  • ACL race bearings, ARP fasteners, exclusive 4P spec head gasket for better seal
  • 4P Pro 163 CNC Cylinder head, 4P custom valves, Ferrea PAC HD valve springs, retainers, and locks
  • 4P tool steel billet RR4 iVTEC camshafts
  • 4P Ported oil pump and baffled sump
  • All new Honda timing components and hardware
  • Complete engine valve cover to oil pan
  • Meticulously assembled and supplied with detailed build sheets

Recommended Use

  • Road Race
  • Time Attack
  • Rally Race
  • Race fuel recommended (compression can be altered to operate with spec fuel)

Features and Benefits

  • Durable components and coatings that are designed to last
  • 4P Super Pro 163 CNC Cylinder Head with the latest in 4 valve cylinder head technology
  • Premium PAC valvetrain designed for long life
  • 4P Oil Pump and baffled pan provide superior oiling at all rpm ranges under cornering, acceleration and heavy braking
  • 4P vented and Engraved Valve Cover Available
  • Cleanliness and attention to detail that everyone will be proud to own
  • Meticulously Assembled - Supplied with full engine specifications and tolerances
  • Recommend periodic maintenance procedures

When you purchase a 4 Piston Racing complete engine, you aren't just buying any run-of-the-mill engine package. You are investing in a fully developed and tested engine program that is designed not only for maximum power output, but also for maximum durability. Our engines are meticulously assembled with a great deal of pride in a clean environment, using the only the finest calibrated tools and by engine builders who specialize in performance racing applications. 50% payment with order, 50% once ready to ship.

products.body_html:
Description

The 4 Piston Racing "Super99" K440 Drag Race Engine is specifically designed to put you at the top of the class when racing within the "99mm Stroke" weight rules, or in any series. This engine is a "no-compromises" approach using the highest quality components available, starting with a rigid 4P ductile iron sleeve and our durable 340 gram aluminum rod. This is connected to a strutted ultra lightweight 15:1+ compression 260 gram piston with tool steel wrist pin. The piston and ring package are specifically designed for this engine to provide superior ring seal for maximum compression. Air and fuel move through this engine via our latest 410+ CFM "Peacemake Jr" CNC Cylinder Head and exclusive Skunk2 BMFx billet camshaft. We are on the cutting edge of 4 valve cylinder head technology and you will not find similar performance in any other cylinder head. Our unique design allows these engines to peak and carry beyond 11,000 rpm, all while retaining the bottom end for excellent acceleration through the early part of the track. The super alloy valves are controlled by the infamous 4P PSI Pro Stock valve spring.  This spring produces high rpm power that is lost in other valve springs, and helps to protect your engine in the event of a missed gear.  On a Dynojet through a FWD transmission, this engine will exceed 400whp on VP M1, and much more on fuels with additives. When you buy a 4P Drag Race engine you aren't just investing in a top competitor, you are investing in a customer support system and an engine program that you can depend on for multiple race seasons.  Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote.  We ship worldwide.

products.title: K24-K360  2.5L Complete Engine - STREET PERFORMANCE
products.body_html:
The 4 Piston Racing K360 Crate Engine takes a big step forward over the K340 with 4P rigid ductile iron sleeves and a larger bore for increased displacement and another 20hp. It provides the ultimate performance and reliability for your street car. This 2.5L Naturally Aspirated engine offers a smooth idle and daily drivable street manners. When you are ready to roll into the throttle, the engine is full of low end punch and comes to life with Honda's i-VTEC system. The high flow CNC cylinder head and high lift camshaft allow this engine to accelerate its 360hp aggressively beyond 9000 rpm. Lean into the throttle on an open road and the power and sound experience is liberating. All this with the peace of mind that you are commanding a durable and reliable engine.  Power is quoted conservatively on pump gasoline an popular street induction and header.  Race pieces will increase output.  Email Luke@team4piston.com for a shipping quote.  We ship worldwide.

  • ACL race bearings, ARP fasteners, exclusive 4P spec head gasket for better seal
  • 4P Pro 163 CNC Cylinder Head with Ferrea valves, valve springs, retainers, and locks
  • 4P tool steel billet RR4 iVTEC camshafts
  • 4P Ported oil pump with baffled sump
  • All new Honda timing components and hardware

  • Auto X

Our engines are meticulously assembled with a great deal of pride in a clean environment, using the only the finest calibrated tools and by engine builders who specialize in performance racing applications.

products.title: Skunk2 Composite Fuel Rail
products.body_html: Skunk2’s cutting-edge fuel rails are available in two materials - aluminum and composite. Composite fuel rails are made using a proprietary carbon-impregnated, aerospace thermo-polymer composite—a material that’s 33-percent lighter, 60-percent stronger, and operates up to 100°F cooler when compared to aluminum and insulates fuel from both radiant and conductive heat transfer underneath the hood, resulting in increased horsepower and torque. Composite Fuel Rails also feature large 0.625-inch internal bores for superior fuel injector pulsation dampening, are machined with a smooth interior finish, and feature radius-cut fuel injector outlets for improved flow characteristics. The all new aluminum fuel rails are are made from 6061T6 aluminum, a material that possesses an ultimate tensile strength of at least 42,000 psi (300 MPa) and yield strength of at least 35,000 psi (241 MPa). Skunk2's all new fuel rails feature large 0.669-inch internal bores for superior fuel injector pulsation dampening, are machined with a smooth interior finish, and feature radius-cut fuel injector outlets for improved flow characteristics. Skunk2’s B-series fuel rails can support up to 1,200hp, with gains as high as three percent realized during testing.

products.title: B-Series 2.3L All Motor RACE Short Block
products.body_html:
4 Piston Racing Short block assembly:

  • Chamfer and debur all sharp edges and oil galleys, chamfer bearing housings and bottom of cylinder bore
  • High pressure thorough cleaning of oil galleys in block and crankshaft
  • Mic pistons and verify straight bore with precision Sunnen bore gauge, set piston to wall clearance for your application
  • Set ring gap for specific application
  • Balance rotating assembly
  • Set bearing clearances
  • Race preparation and debur to piston dome
  • Precision assembly in clean room

We build each engine to suit individual racing application... Drag race, road race, hill climb, street use, etc.

Components

  • Sleeved Block - LA Sleeves rigid design that cuts less of the block away and keeps cylinders from moving over time.
  • Billet 98mm Crank - Billet 98mm Crankshaft
  • GRP Aluminum Pro Stock Rods - 330 gram Ultra Light weight, long rod setup. 
  • 4P Wiseco Pro Stock Pistons - Ultra Lightweight 255 Gram 4P Pistons with tool steel wrist pins.
  • ACL Race Bearings

Options

  • 4P Custom Steel Connecting Rod - Strong long lasting design (6 week lead time, made to order)
  • GRP Solid Beam Rod - Recommended for Nitromethane enhanced fuels
  • Ported GSR Oil Pump - The OEM GSR pump works great for motors that turn up to 9000 rpm. Past that, the pump can cavitate. We modify brand new OEM pumps for use up to 11,000 rpm.

products.title: L19 Extreme Duty Head Studs
products.body_html:
SpeedFactory Racing Extreme Duty L19 Head Stud Kit for Honda/Acura B & K Series (B18C1, B18C5, B20VTEC, LSVTEC, K20, K24)

This Kit was designed for hardcore drag racers running high boost levels that need more clamping force and tensile strength than the typical 8740 chromoly studs on the market. If you are looking for the best option, you've found it as these are 25% stronger than any other available off the shelf Head Stud Kit for your Honda/Acura!

These studs are manufactured specifically for us by ARP and utilize an L19 material that is much stronger than the typical 8740 chromoly and yields a tensile strength of 240-260,000 psi. They are also provisioned with a hex broach on the top of the stud for ease of installation and enabling you to install them with the cylinder head on the car if necessary.

What makes these head studs better than the competition?

Initially these might look just like other ARP and A1 Technologies head studs available on the market, but that isn't the case.

Superior L19 Alloy steel, much stronger than the typical 8740 chromoly. Achieve higher clamp loads of 240,000-260,000 psi as opposed to the competitions 190,000-210,000 psi rating. Hex broach on the top of the stud for ease of installation. No Modification to your cylinder head or block is required as these are a direct drop-in replacement for the OEM head studs. Recommended for applications boosting higher than 30 PSI.

·Each kit includes a complete set of L19 head studs, nuts, washers and ARP Assembly Lubricant.
